about_the_game:
Play the full version of UpGun with lots of new and exclusive content !
All players in a DLC lobby need to own the DLC in order to access the content.

The full version of the game contains :

  • 30+ more skills
    Play with more skill, more flexibility et try new synergies !
    Including but not only : Self repair / Charged Spray / Teleportation disc

  • New gamemodes
    Including team deathmatch !

  • New maps
    Oppose your friends on exclusives maps !
    Fight on an Oil Rig

  • More regular updates

  • More mutators
    Play with new rules and customize your games.
    6 mutators are available with the DLC !

  • Public servers
    Access a list of public server to play with anyone !

name: UpGun - FullGame

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7
  • Processor: IntelCore i3 gen 5
  • Graphics: Nvidia 670
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 400 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: IntelCore i5 gen 5
  • Graphics: GTX 880
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 600 MB available space

short_description: Face your friends in UpGun! Use each round to accumulate skills and overtake your opponents in this crazy deathmatch! Play the full version to access all the content!
supported_languages: French, English, German, Russian, Italian, Spanish - Spain
